title.narrative: CHILD RIGHTS MONITORING

description.narrative: BiH Council for Children systematically monitoring child rights and reporting to relevant international and national institutions, which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Economic And Social Policy General, Evaluation And Research, Human Rights Institutions, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence, Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020 relevant government institutions are strengthened to monitor child rights, reduce poverty and provide inclusive access to social protection services, including for the most marginalized children, especially Roma children and girls and boys with disabilities

sector.narrative: Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Justice, birth registration/CRVS, and alternative care - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: BiH Council for Children systematically monitoring child rights and reporting to relevant international and national institutions

description.narrative: In 2020 UNICEF supported the Ministry for Human Rights and Refugees and the multi-sectoral working group to develop the 2021-2025 Action Plan for Monitoring the Committee on the Rights of the Child (CRC) Concluding Observations. The voices of children through the NGO Network Stronger Voice for Children were included in this Action Plan and in all UNICEF-supported activities in 2020. | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/01/2021
